channel.title: Found a glitch
channel.description: Hello i was playing black mesa then i found a glitch. right after the scripted cutscene where you get captured i went down the tube and i get launched out of the map. if you can fix this it would be great. i took a vid of it it might be a little laggy though. [url='https://www.twitch.tv/mattmo831/b/332328576']https://www.twitch.tv/mattmo831/b/332328576[/url] its at about 1:07 in the vid

item.title: Found a glitch
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
record

then play for a bit. when you are done type

stop

it will create a .dem file in your BMS directory. You can either upload that somewhere to show the devs, or use the startmovie command to turn it into a high definition, smooth video
